thread.title: JURUPA VALLEY: Eastvale park on district agenda
thread.title_full: JURUPA VALLEY: Eastvale park on district agenda - Press Enterprise

author: SANDRA STOKLEY
title: JURUPA VALLEY: Eastvale park on district agenda
text:
By SANDRA STOKLEY / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 21, 2015 Updated: 3:46 p.m. JURUPA VALLEY: Eastvale park on district agenda Print Photo Share Pin It More Galleries ADVERTISEMENT The Jurupa Community Services District board of directors will meet Monday, Oct. 26. PHOTO COURTESY JURUPA COMMUNITY SERVICES DISTRICT Related article Â» The Jurupa Community Services District board of directors on Monday, Oct. 26 will consider awarding a contract for construction and project management services for phase II of Eastvale Community Park.
Staff is recommending the $299,200 contract be awarded to Project Dimensions Inc. The contract will cover pre-construction, construction management and post-construction services.
General manager Todd Corbin said phase II will include a complex comprised of four softball playing fields. Construction is expected to begin in mid-2016.
The Jurupa Community Services District will meet at 7 p.m. at 11201 Harrel St. in Jurupa Valley.
Information: 951-685-7434.
Contact the writer: 951-368-9647 or sstokley@pe.com
